books.author: by Peter Schweizer
books.description: The author of “Clinton Cash” gives his evaluations of members of the Democratic Party.
books.name: PROFILES IN CORRUPTION

books.author: by Philip Rucker and Carol Leonnig
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalists use firsthand accounts to chart patterns of behavior within the Trump administration.
books.name: A VERY STABLE GENIUS

books.author: by Kobe Bryant
books.description: Various skills and techniques used on the court by the Los Angeles Lakers player.
books.name: THE MAMBA MENTALITY

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Bryan Stevenson
books.description: A law professor and MacArthur grant recipient’s memoir of his decades of work to free innocent people condemned to death.
books.name: JUST MERCY

books.author: by Ezra Klein
books.description: The editor at large and co-founder of Vox offers his take on what causes divisions in America.
books.name: WHY WE'RE POLARIZED

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Famous examples of miscommunication serve as the backdrop to explain potential conflicts and misunderstandings.
books.name: TALKING TO STRANGERS

books.author: by Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady describes her journey from the South Side of Chicago to the White House, and how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent.
books.name: BECOMING

books.author: by Lori Gottlieb
books.description: A psychotherapist gains unexpected insights when she becomes another therapist’s patient.
books.name: MAYBE YOU SHOULD TALK TO SOMEONE

books.author: by Layla F. Saad
books.description: Ways to understand and possibly counteract white privilege.
books.name: ME AND WHITE SUPREMACY

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by John Carreyrou
books.description: The rise and fall of Theranos, the biotech startup that failed to deliver on its promise to make blood testing more efficient.
books.name: BAD BLOOD

books.author: by Bill Bryson
books.description: An owner’s manual of the human body covering various parts, functions and what happens when things go wrong.
books.name: THE BODY

books.author: by Ronan Farrow
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter details some surveillance and intimidation tactics used to pressure journalists and elude consequences by certain wealthy and connected men.
books.name: CATCH AND KILL
